text: “Koma choona pamene chidawadzera kuchokera kwa Ife, adati: “Bwanji sadapatsidwe zonga zomwe adapatsidwa Mûsa? (Monga kutembenuza ndodo kukhala njoka, ndi zina zotero).” Kodi kalelo sadazikane zomwe adapatsidwa Mûsa? Nkunena (za Taurati ndi Qur’an): “Ndimatsenga awiri amene akuthandizana.” Ndipo adati: “Ndithu ife tikuwakana onse.”
